attributes.action: Allow schools to put on traditional christian nativity plays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a christian country, and yet year on year the christian values in this country are being swept aside, my sons school being the latest in a long line that are not permitted to celebrate christmas in the traditional manner and have been banned from putting on a traditional christian nativity play, i ask now that our Prime Minister and his government put an end to this systematic destruction of our traditions and permit schools to celebrate christmas in the traditional manner that they have done for generations.

rejection.details: The arranging of nativity plays is a decision for each individual school.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
